timeline.title: Admitted to Ecole des Beaux-Arts
timeline.description: Admitted to the Ecole des Beaux-Arts in Paris.

timeline.title: Completed Architectural Training
timeline.description: Completed his architectural training at the Ecole des Beaux-Arts in Paris.

timeline.title: Joined City Planning Department in Casablanca
timeline.description: Joined the City Planning Department in Casablanca, working with Henri Prost.

timeline.title: Collaboration on Habous Quarter
timeline.description: Began working with Edmond Brion on the Habous Quarter in Casablanca.

timeline.title: Construction of Mosquée Moulay Youssef
timeline.description: Built the Mosquée Moulay Youssef in les Habous, Casablanca.

timeline.title: Construction of Mosquée in Rabat
timeline.description: Built the Mosquée in rue Ibn Bajah, Diour Jamaa, Rabat.

timeline.title: Construction of Mosquée de Khemisset
timeline.description: Built the Mosquée de Khemisset in Khemisset.

timeline.title: Construction of his house in Casablanca (rue du Parc)
timeline.description: Built his house in rue du Parc, Casablanca.

timeline.title: Construction of Cité Diour Jamâa
timeline.description: Built Cité Diour Jamâa in Rabat (between 1930 and 1933).

timeline.title: Construction of Mosquée Sidi Mohammed Ben Youssef
timeline.description: Built the Mosquée Sidi Mohammed Ben Youssef in les Habous, Casablanca (between 1934 and 1936).

timeline.title: Construction of Mahkama du Pacha in Rabat
timeline.description: Built the Mahkama du Pacha in Rabat (between 1938 and 1939).

timeline.title: Construction of Mahkama du Pacha in Casablanca
timeline.description: Built the Mahkama du Pacha in Casablanca (between 1941 and 1952).

timeline.title: Construction of his house in Oasis (Casablanca)
timeline.description: Built his house in rue des Charmilles, Oasis (Casablanca). This house was destroyed in 2010.

timeline.title: Construction of Mosquée Yaqoub el-Mansour
timeline.description: Built the Mosquée Yaqoub el-Mansour in Rabat.

links.title: Architecture marocaine du XXe siècle - Edmond Brion et Auguste Cadet
